strings.string: \rThis is the Temple of the Servants of the Mushroom cloud. Faded posters line the walls.\r
\rThe side halls are dim and quiet. The north bright and quiet.\r
\rYou hear the sounds of meditation.\r
\rThis is a small meditation room, with a painting on the far wall.\r
\rLoud chanting of many different mantras rolls forth from the room in front of you.\r
\rThis is a clothing storage room.\r
\rA sign drops from the ceiling. It reads THIS WAY OUT.\r
\r"May the Great Glow guide you in your travels."\r
\r"Go away, you vile infidels."\r
\r"You call that a gift?"\r
\rThis high security door looks very strong.\r
\rYou climb over the rubble.\r
\rYou have spotted a hidden door in the wall.\r
\rThis is a locked steel door.\r
\rEntering Nuclear First Aid.\r
\rEntering the Center of Holy Knowledge.\r
\rThe way is blocked by a heavy steel doors.\r
You have stepped on some bare wires.\r
You touched some exposed components.\r
\rYour abilities tell you that it would be unsafe to move farther in this electrical room.\r
\rThis is the half-human Temple Guardians' quarters.\r
\rYou have successfully welded it shut.\r
\rYou cut through the weld and opened it.\r
\rThere are open portholes in the walls.\r
"Oh great Plank, you are constant. Help me meditate."\r
This woman glows with a purple-white radiance.\r
A robed and bald young lad looks at you.\r
Hideous almost human Temple guards face you.\r
\rThe door is all over the place, in little pieces.\r
\rA battered door hangs from one hinge.\r
\rAn open door.\r
\r"Nrc Nrc Nrc."\r
\rYou hear in the distance, "Nuke 'em till they glow, and shoot 'em in the dark."\r
"Speak the name of the Holy One."\r
EINSTEIN
OPPENHEIMER
"Do you seek the Great Glow?"\r\r\x11\x10Yes\r\x10No\r
Y
N
"Did you bring a gift?"\r\r\x11\x10Yes\r\x10No\r
"What is your gift?"\r
BLOODSTAFF
\rAll that is left of the Radiation Angel is a pile of glowing dust.\r
\rMassive electronic equipment hums and clicks all around you.\r
\rThe concrete walls glow with a faint blue radiance.\r
\rThe walls of the reactor core are hot to the touch.\r
\rThis is a picture of a fuzzy haired old man. The plaque next to it reads, "Einstein gave us the theory."\r
\rThis picture shows a distinguished middle aged man. The plaque under it reads, "Oppenheimer, the father of the bomb."\r
\rThe picture on the wall is of a man in very odd clothes. Written on the picture is the message, "Plank is always constant. h=6.626 X 10-34 J sec."\r
\r"Come forward and show yourselves."\r
\rYou are being attacked from all sides as portholes open in the walls around you.\r
\r"Welcome to our Temple. Enter and Learn."\r
\rElectrical Generators.\r
\rCooling Controls.\r
\rCoolant Processing.\r
\rTac Nuc Manufacturing.\r
\rControl Room.\r
\x07Welcome to Nuclear First Aid.\r
\x07Welcome to the Center of Holy Knowledge.\r
\rWatching you from this corner is an armored camera.\r
\rThis dusty hallway has not been used in a long time.\r
\r"Move to your left so I can see you."\r
\r"Please don't hurt me. I don't wanna join. I'm warning you. Don't come any closer or you'll be nuked."\r
"Please leave me alone."\r
\rFIRST AID.\r
\rTECHNICAL TRAINING.\r
\rA burned-out camera isn't looking at you.\r
A wimp of a Nuke Tech is working at the controls.\r
\rDusty and unused, these weapons are falling apart.\r
\rThat did not affect the camera.\r
\r"Yes I'll join you. My name is Dr. Michael Scott. My specialty is fixing up people."\r
\rThe boiling hot pipes are hidden by a dense cloud of steam, the freezing cold pipes are covered with ice.\r
\rGet off that table! You don't sit on tables at home do you!?\r
\rYou find only dust when you look here.\r
\rThe door easily pushes open at your touch.\r
\rThe intense cold of the pipes causes you to stumble back.\r
\rWaves of heat cause you to fall to the floor.\r
\rThis electronic panel full of dials and gauges looks like the cooling pump controls.\r
\rThe dials and gauges all fall to zero as the pumps slow to a halt.\r
\rYou don't know enough about machines to be playing with this equipment.\r
\rThe dials and gauges on the panel are all at zero.\r
\rThe pumps grind their way to up full speed as the gauges and dials spring to life.\r
\rThis door has been deliberately welded shut.\r
\rOops! You blasted a hole in the door. Now radioactive sludge is flowing out toward you.\r
\rWhew! You almost opened the door.\r
A doctor stands to greet you.\r
\rThe ice on these pipes has melted into pools of water.\r
\rThe steam has condensed on these pipes, and run off on to the floor.\r
\rThe water on the floor has shorted out this panel.\r
\rThis is a poster of a man in T-shirt and shorts typing at a computer. The plaque under the picture reads STANCE THE GREAT MAP MAKER.\r
\rA brightly glowing grenade flies over your head and explodes behind you.\r
\rYou hear ominous sounds as the pumps shut down.\r
\rALERT! ALERT! Cooling system failure evacuate immediately.\r
\rThe sounds of liquid flowing through the pipes is music to your ears.\r
\rWARNING! Reactor meltdown will require destruction of all passages to prevent radioactive spread.\r
\rA huge explosion knocks you to the ground as the hall behind you caves in.\r
A raggedly group of religious zealots face you.\r
The tall lovely priestess pulls a laser pistol from her robes.\r
\rYou could make out what they were saying if you moved closer.\r
\r"STOP THERE! Do not come any closer!" Charmaine demands. Even though she is glowing purple, she has got to be the most beautiful woman you have ever seen.\r
\r"Never snub me in that manner."\r
\r"Go to the meditation rooms and learn."\r
\rRead paragraph 129.\r
\r"Thank you for the Bloodstaff." Read paragraph 76.\r
\r"I do not want to see anyone right now."\r
\r"I see that you do not have the Bloodstaff."\r
"Have you brought the Bloodstaff?."\r
\rYou set off a nuke grenade and are radiated.\r
\r"Leave us now."\r
\r"Imposters! That is not the true Bloodstaff."\r
\r"Let me see the Bloodstaff."\r
\rStay off the throne!\r
\r"Who sent you?"\r
FAT FREDDY
FARAN BRYGO
\r"So, you are part of that scum's gang. Get em'"\r
\r"That's not a bloodstaff. How stupid do you think I am?"\r
\rThis huge steel door has a weird keyhole in it.\r
